snippet.title: Hitman GO | VR Edition Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Available now on the Oculus Rift and Gear VR.

Hitman GO is a simple to play, but difficult to master turn-based strategy game, set in a stunning interpretation of the Hitman universe. You will strategically navigate fixed spaces on a grid to avoid enemies and take out your target, or to infiltrate well-guarded locations. This beautifully rendered, diorama-style strategy game focuses on forward thinking progression through perplexing levels and stylish freeze frame environments, to challenge even the most accomplished Hitman fan. The VR adaptation offers a completely new take on the original, award-winning Hitman GO, allowing for immersive interaction that underscores the game’s attention to detail and craftsmanship.
